page.title: 18THE CLOTHING THAT WE WEAR
page.content: The clothing we wear depends on the weather.On a hot day we mostly wear shorts and T-shirt or just shorts.If it is a cold and windy day we wear trousers,shirt and jumper.When we go swimming we wear things easy to get on and off.If we go to a dance or a party boys mostly wear jeans and T-shirts, and the lovely girls wear mini-skirts and T-shirts.Our underwear can be these items:pants,knickers,bra,vest, bloomers and petticoats.When we go shopping or to bonfires,some us wear tracksuits.SHOES:If it is a hot and sunny day we either wear Flip- Flops or Sandals so that our feet don't get hot.When it is cold wear trainers and if it is snowy rainy or muddy we wear wellington boots.Our school uniform is this,the girls wear skirt, shirt, tie,cardigan or jumper.The boys wear shorts,shirt,tie and jumper.
